definition: fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The thin heads of grain swallowed up the seven healthy, full heads.
sentences.chinese: 这细弱的穗子吞了那七个又肥大又饱满的穗子。

sentences.english: Objective To study the imaging features of Klippel-Trenaunay syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨静脉畸形骨肥大综合征影像诊断的征象。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate a new method of genioplasty for treatment of a prominent mandibular angle with mandibular malformation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索治疗下颌角肥大伴颏畸形时隆颏的新方法。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the understanding and diagnosis of primary hypertrophic osteoarthropathy(PHO).
sentences.chinese: 目的提高对原发性肥大性骨关节病的认识和诊断。

sentences.english: But there are a lot of patients with prostate enlargement, suffer from bladder calculi are not aware of it.
sentences.chinese: 但有很多前列腺肥大患者，患上膀胱结石却不自知。

sentences.english: Select the right clothes, do not wear baggy clothes.
sentences.chinese: 不要穿过于松垮肥大的衣服，穿着一定要合身。

sentences.english: A fat gray cat rubs against her leg. It meows.
sentences.chinese: 一只肥大的灰猫讨好地抓她的腿，喵喵地叫唤着。

sentences.english: This river-sea ship belongs to low-speed full form.
sentences.chinese: 该江海直达船属于低速肥大船型。

sentences.english: Conclusion Ginsenoside can prevent or delay the development of hypertrophy.
sentences.chinese: 结论人参皂苷在早期能预防或延缓心肌肥大的发生。

sentences.english: The treatment options for acromegaly and the relationships between acromegaly and malignancy are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 我们回顾肢端肥大症的治疗及其与癌症的关系。

sentences.english: The veteran physician Shi Hanzhang s experience on the treatment of prostatic hyperplasia was presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍老中医施汉章治疗前列腺肥大的经验。

sentences.english: METHODS. Primary human conjunctival mast cells and epithelial cells were obtained from cadaveric conjunctival tissue.
sentences.chinese: 人结膜肥大细胞和上皮细胞从尸体结膜组织获得。

sentences.english: Significant degranulation in the mast cells was observed mainly during metaestrus.
sentences.chinese: 肥大细胞在发情后期有明显的脱颗粒现象。

sentences.english: No medical treatment has any effect on large adenoids.
sentences.chinese: 任何医疗对扁桃体肥大都没有效果。

sentences.english: The sports dress is too loose.
The critical electrolyte concentration of MCs was also lower too in periodontitis patients.
sentences.chinese: 牙周炎组肥大细胞的临界电解质浓度值也较低。

definition: fur/down (soft fur)/villi capillary (in the small intestine)
lower half of one's body/Lower Body (Chinese poetry movement of the early 21st century)
